name: Extra Terrestrial Fishing
description:
Extra Terrestrial Fishing

Collect fish and store as many fish as possible in the center of the map before the timer runs out, but be careful, the fishermen want their fish back.

Why does an alien need so many fish? Good question!

Oh, and also your only weapon is fish, good luck!

Controls:
  • WASD: Movement
  • Press Left Mouse: Pick up fish
  • Release Left Mouse: Throw fish
Credits:
  • Penple: Software
  • Wea$el: Music / Audio
  • Klemay: Art
Created in 72 hours for Mini Jam 91
